module.name: Embedded
module.author: Core

property.title: Background transparent?
property.helpText: Should the Widget be shown with a transparent background? Also requires the embedded content to have a transparent background.

property.title: Scale Content?
property.helpText: Should the embedded content be scaled along with the layout?

property.title: Preload?
property.helpText: Should this Widget be loaded entirely off-screen so that it is ready when shown? Dynamic content will start running off screen.

property.title: HTML to embed
property.helpText: Enter text or HTML in the box below.

property.title: JavaScript
property.helpText: Add JavaScript to be included in the HTML. Do not use [] array notation as this is reserved for library references. Do not include script tags.

property.title: HEAD content to embed
property.helpText: Add content to appear within the HEAD tags on this embedded HTML. Please include script tags.
